metadata.name: NtdllPipe Like Activity Execution
metadata.comment: Detects command that type the content of ntdll.dll to a different file or a pipe in order to evade AV / EDR detection. As seen being used in the POC NtdllPipe

batch.sql: SELECT * FROM process_activity WHERE time BETWEEN CURRENT_TIMESTAMP() - INTERVAL 24 HOUR AND CURRENT_TIMESTAMP() AND (lower(activity_id) = lower('1') AND (contains(lower(process.cmd_line), lower('type %windir%\\system32\\ntdll.dll')) OR contains(lower(process.cmd_line), lower('type %systemroot%\\system32\\ntdll.dll')) OR contains(lower(process.cmd_line), lower('type c:\\windows\\system32\\ntdll.dll')) OR contains(lower(process.cmd_line), lower('\\ntdll.dll > \\.\\pipe\\'))))

output.summary: Detects command that type the content of ntdll.dll to a different file or a pipe in order to evade AV / EDR detection. As seen being used in the POC NtdllPipe
